parts.Title: One of Us
parts.Description: Player in Combat Lounge Discord Server

1.Title: COMMUNITY 1
1.Progress: Join the Combat Community discord!  Click the link at the top of the page to join!

2.Title: COMMUNITY 2
2.Progress: Don't be shy, community is all about the players and we want to know about you!  It can just be a catchphrase or a full description.  All submissions are manually reviewed to meet community safety/comfort standards.

3.Title: COMMUNITY 3
3.Progress: Show off your mad-crazy chassis style with a cool pic of you in-game or in-lobby!  Get a fellow player to take a pic and send to you and make friends!

4.Title: COMMUNITY 4
4.Progress: Create or join a team!  Take the next step on your Echo Combat journey.  Many of the best teams were created from a group of complete strangers whom became close friends!  You can either join another player's team or create one wiith your friends!

68.Title: DEATHS CHALLENGE
68.Progress: You've been eliminated %p times for the season.  Play more games!  Try to be aggressive and not afraid of dying.  You will always respawn be able to return to the battlefield to help your team try to win.  A player who dies more can actually be a good thing in many matches!
